# Final Statement from P2

Thank you all for an incredible journey. Throughout this game, I've aimed to be transparent, strategic, and genuine in my interactions with each of you. While I've had to make difficult decisions, I've always approached them with respect and honesty.

I believe my balanced approach to building alliances while making necessary strategic moves has earned me this spot. Unlike my opponent, I've never misrepresented my intentions or played both sides.

I respect your judgment as jury members who experienced this game firsthand. If you value authentic gameplay and consistent strategy, I ask for your vote today.

As P5, here's my final statement to the jury:

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be direct, strategic, and fair in my interactions. While forming genuine connections, I never resorted to deception or betrayal. I've survived by building trust and making calculated decisions, not through manipulation. P2 has played well, but I believe my balanced approach of social awareness and competitive spirit makes me more deserving of the win. I ask for your vote based on my consistent and honorable gameplay.
